summary: A mysterious man emerges from the Argentinean rainforest to help a poor farmer and his daughter, who are threatened by a band of mercenaries hired to force them to sell their land.
cast: Gael García Bernal|Alice Braga|Claudio Tolcachir|Chico Díaz|Jorge Sesán|Julián Tello|Lautaro Vilo|Iván Steinhardt|Jorge Prado|Ruslan Kulchenko|Pablo Chaparro|Héctor Bordoni|Marcelo Farías|Natalia Soto
title: Ardor. La justicia de los débiles
